courses.title: Python: Beginner to Advanced
courses.description: Master Python programming from the ground up. Start with basics and progress to advanced topics including OOP, file handling, and real-world projects.

courses.title: Python for Machine Learning
courses.description: Learn machine learning with Python. Cover data science fundamentals, popular ML libraries, neural networks, and build real AI projects.

courses.title: Python for Trading
courses.description: Build algorithmic trading strategies with Python. Master financial data analysis, technical indicators, backtesting, and live trading APIs.
